metadata.title: CVE-2015-0211 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: mod/lti/ajax.php in Moodle through 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.7, 2.7.x before2.7.4, and 2.8.x before 2.8.2 does not consider themoodle/course:manageactivities and mod/lti:addinstance capabilities beforeproceeding with registered-tool list searches, which allows remoteauthenticated users to obtain sensitive information via requests to the LTIAjax service.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
